channel.title: Need good modelers, suggestors and SFX artists! - For the first 3D "RSPS"
channel.description:
Last year I purchased the realm-cr.after game engine but never used it, and it has been in my mind ages about remodeling runescape and turning it into a "full mmorpg". Here's some pictures of the realm-cr.after engine:
[img]http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-8iXWzTVEN1M/TYtaDi7MvVI/AAAAAAAAAKY/F8h6CThczHo/s1600/BuubleFontHaxTest.bmp[/img] [img]http://img.youtube.com/vi/Ks5RUvLwPg4/0.jpg[/img]
Would anybody be interested in this idea? I need suggestors, 3D modelers and SFX artist for now.

item.title: Need good modelers, suggestors and SFX artists! - For the first 3D "RSPS"
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

Please put effort into a post if you’re looking for a team, and post it over at:

http://gamedev.moparisthebest.com/smf

Read full topic
item.source: Need good modelers, suggestors and SFX artists! - For the first 3D "RSPS"
